company.name: Bandai Namco Games Daewon Media (South Korea)

name: Kamen Rider: Climax Scramble
summary: Kamen Rider: Climax Scramble, is a Japanese fighting game developed by Eighting and Bandai Namco Entertainment exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. Serving as the sequel to Kamen Rider: Climax Fighters, it is the second installment of the Climax Fighters reboot and the seventh overall installment of the Kamen Rider: Climax series. Celebrating the 20th anniversary of the franchise, the game features all the Riders within the Heisei-era that ended with Zi-O as playable characters.
